thread.title: Hardware Mod to Fix Display Flickering, Overheating, and Reboots on the LG G3
thread.title_full: Hardware Mod to Fix Display Flickering, Overheating, and Reboots on the LG G3

author: Mishaal Rahman
title: Hardware Mod to Fix Display Flickering, Overheating, and Reboots on the LG G3
text: With a little bit of thermal grease and aluminum foil, you can temporarily solve display flickering, overheating, and frequent reboots on your LG G3. XDA Senior Member IngJulian_RVLX has put together a picture guide on opening up your G3 so you can bring it back to life, DIY style!
